title: Everyday Driver
description: This week; long time friends of the show Paul and Todd of Everyday Driver join us once again. Matt decied it was a good idea to take a G63 AMG out on the track at Buttonwillow to see if he could somehow invent a new kind of understeer, Todd took the LS400 out to Miller Motorsports park, I curse a shitty Uber ripoff, Randy Pobst knows how to tune suspension and interior designers do their best research upon the commode.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
